Her Türk genci gibi Cs aşığıyız tamam. Ama oyun güzel hatta mükemmel. Ancak son günlerde hile artışı ve yapılan güncellemer oyundan bir tık soğuttu. Yaş sınırı kesinlikle gelmeli ve ücretsiz olmamalıydı. Şu hilelerin önüne geçilse takımın olduğu zaman çok güzel bir oyunsun be CS GO..
EL JUEGO ES EL MEJOR DE SIGLO

Probably the best, most competitive, and balanced FPS ever made. I would recommend this game highly to anyone who wants to get better at map sense, aiming, grenade usage, and teamwork. It might be tough at first, but once it clicks, it's hard to beat.

This game is really good I play this game almost every day I have become addicted to skin and friendly community in the game this helps me to boost my stamina after coming from school tired and restful which is really good thing that I love about the game .this also has competition,casual,deathmatch,and wingman mode which I very play all the time
Good Game! One of the best!
Bestes Spiel, was ich je gespielt habe.
This game is the best thing that ever happened to FPS genre.
This game has made me many friends through my almost 1,000 hours
